amendatorysection.catchline: Judicial review; effect of decision on other structures.
amendatorysection.para: In any case in which airport zoning regulations adopted under sections 3-301 to 3-333, although generally reasonable, are held by a court to interfere with the use or enjoyment of a particular structure or parcel of land to such an extent or to be so onerous in their application to such a structure or parcel of land, as to constitute a taking or deprivation of that property in violation of the Constitution of this state or the Constitution of the United States, such holding shall not affect the application of such regulations to other structures and parcels of land.
